definition: to refrain/to give up evil (temporarily)/to cover one's traces/to lie low/to retire (from view)
to hold back/to restrain/to control (oneself)/to collect/Taiwan pr. [lian4]

sentences.english: The shapes of the past dissolved and the future was free of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 往昔已敛迹循形，未来没有云雾笼罩。

definition: fine hair grown by animals (or down grown by birds) in the fall/(fig.) sth barely discernible/the slightest thing/the minutest detail
strict/serious/solemn/dignified/to tidy up/to clean up/to purge/to adjust
to look forward and back cautiously
to judge (i.e. to hear and pass judgment in a law court)/to hear and decide
lit. a caged bird in a pavilion (idiom); fig. to lose vigilance by comfortable living/unaware of the disasters ahead/a fool's paradise
(literary) to cover/to conceal/to hide from view
